content:
Hi Haryy,

Your "twelve books" link seem have a similar problem as 
http://devhawk.net/CommentView.aspx?guid=dd06efd1-cf51-4eed-927a-c82a01273b47 :)

Chip Anderson, my former boss at stockcharts.com, used to come in many mornings with some new idea or project for us to work on, the germ of which came to him in the shower. I'd joke that we needed a spray bottle of water on his desk for developing new inspirations during the workday!

One of my best friends in college used this technique religiously. If he ever got stuck on a problem, he would go take a shower - and emerge 10 minutes later with an answer. 

In fact, his only problem was that once he figured things out, he never actually wanted to DO them. To him, the "challenging" part was already done.

:)
